subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Filippo Simeoni has handed back the winner’s jersey he claimed at last year’s Italian national championship in protest of his Ceramica Flaminia team’s being left out of this month’s Giro d’Italia. His team was not deemed strong enough to invite to the Giro.
